title: The supervision certificate and the completion certificate of every such building shall contain a ce
clause_text: The supervision certificate and the completion certificate of every such building shall contain a certificate recorded by the Structural Engineer that the norms of IS: 1893-2002 have been followed in the design and construction of buildings for making the buildings resistant to earthquake and compliance with other structural safety and fire safety requirements
section: Structural Safety for Protection of Buildings against Natural Hazard:
